text:
B rooke Shields has revealed the embarrassing pick-up line that Donald Trump used to try and get her to go on a date with him.

The US actress recalled the cringe-worthy moment that the President tried to woo her in the 1990s on Andy Cohen’s chat show.

Clearly embarrassed by the mere existence of a photo of her with Trump, Shield admitted that he had tried his best to date her following his divorce from Marla Maples in 1999.

“I can’t even speak,” she said when Cohen presented her with the photo. “He called me when I was on location doing a movie right after he had gotten a divorce.”

She added: “He said, ‘I really think we should date because you’re America’s sweetheart and I’m America’s richest man. The people would love it.’”

The awkward pick-up line, and attempt at a PR stunt, clearly didn’t wash with Shields, who promptly informed Trump that she was spoken for.

“I have a boyfriend. I really don’t think it would be — he’s not gonna really be happy about it,” she told Trump.

Candice Bergen recently confessed that she went on a blind date with Trump while she was a college, but declined a second date.

“He was a good-looking guy and a douche,” she said last month. “I was home very early. There was no physical contact whatsoever.”

Bergen revealed that the POTUS had arrived to pick her up wearing a “burgundy three-piece suit, with burgundy patent leather boots and he was in a burgundy limousine”.
title: Brooke Shields reveals the cringe-worthy pick-up line Donald Trump used to ask her out

meta_data.description: The actress and model politely declined a date as she was already spoken for
